Rather, the font is only preloaded on the related route/s based on the type of file where it is used: - -- if it's a [unique page](/docs/pages/building-your-application/routing/pages-and-layouts), it is preloaded on the unique route for that page -- if it's in the [custom App](/docs/pages/building-your-application/routing/custom-app), it is preloaded on all the routes of the site under `/pages` - - - -## Reusing fonts - -Every time you call the `localFont` or Google font function, that font is hosted as one instance in your application. Therefore, if you load the same font function in multiple files, multiple instances of the same font are hosted. In this situation, it is recommended to do the following: - -- Call the font loader function in one shared file -- Export it as a constant -- Import the constant in each file where you would like to use this font
